function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Variation in compliance globally","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of personality characteristics on willingness to accept restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association of political orientation with compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of the sars-cov-2 virus globally","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of treatment or vaccine for sars-cov-2","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of communication in generating desirable behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on the health status of employees","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and disease prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access requirements explicitly mentioned for policy measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of non-unique policy measures in different media reports","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existential threat to companies in case of prolonged sales decline","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing interrater reliability and refining criteria among researchers could increase the risk of disease transmission in case of close collaboration in a high-risk environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases during in-person interviews and meetings","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of funding for future research on the impact of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for future economic crises related to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of support for startups and entrepreneurial ecosystems during the covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exchange of information in online crisis groups could lead to the spread of misinformation and incorrect advice regarding disease management.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Communicating intention for startup specific support early may lead to the gathering of large groups of individuals in physical spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease specific barriers for startups may lead to relaxed regulations and oversight, potentially compromising public health and safety standards.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of entrepreneurial opportunity during crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adversity and coping strategies in startups","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Barriers in policy support services for startups","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate relief measures for entrepreneurs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of specific policy measures for startups","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The presence of fewer than 100 cases of covid-19 in some countries may lead to a false sense of security and reduce the urgency of implementing effective measures to mitigate the spread of the virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on short-term aid measures may create dependency on government support and hinder long-term resilience and sustainability of smes and startups.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in loan interest rates and loan availability may lead to increased borrowing and debt burden for smes and startups, potentially creating financial instability in the future.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High level of entrepreneurship pre-crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Post-disaster entrepreneurs contributing to recovery","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying solely on entrepreneurial initiative to fix economic damage triggered by lockdown measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Startups relying heavily on relational capabilities may lead to increased risk of disease propagation through close contact and interaction with partners and the startup community.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived mismatch between startup characteristics and government support services can lead to a lack of access to necessary resources for maintaining health and safety standards.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cognizance of customers’ shifting needs may lead to increased risk of disease spread if startups are unable to adapt and respond to changes in customer behavior.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation and flexibility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpreparedness for the impact of covid-19 on entrepreneurial activities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced sales and fixed costs threatening startups’ liquidity and long-term survival.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic climate is unfavorable for innovation due to the covid-19 crisis.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers to accessing funding and plateau patterned growth due to gridlocked markets.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Email addresses provided may be used for phishing attacks, spreading malicious software, or unauthorized access.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Early stage outbreak containment in a specific area","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased effectiveness of travel restrictions in widespread outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Balancing public health benefits with negative impacts on freedom of movement, economy, and society","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in sex ratio of later cases without reported travel history","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cases with no known travel history contributing to disseminating sars-cov-2 outside of wuhan","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Containment of respiratory infections characterized by mild symptoms or pre-symptomatic transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Laboratory testing during the early phase of the epidemic was critical","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mobility out of wuhan remained the main driver of spread before the cordon sanitaire","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scant travel history information for some provinces , zhejiang and guangdong","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential correlation between human mobility and growth rates of daily case counts from wuhan","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased testing capacity coinciding with the travel ban","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
